options.comment: get plans' limit sessions and cost
get facilities with completed treatments on the selected month

sql.query:
SELECT f.*
FROM facility f
INNER JOIN treatments t ON t."facilityId" = f.id
INNER JOIN "detailsPayment" dp ON dp.id = t."paymentId"
WHERE t.complete = TRUE AND TO_CHAR(t."createdAt", 'MM') = :P1 AND TO_CHAR(t."createdAt", 'YYYY') = :P2 AND t."paymentId" IS NOT NULL AND dp."freeTrialEndAt" IS NULL
GROUP BY f.id
ORDER BY f.id ASC

SELECT
COUNT(t.id) AS "totalTreatments",
t."paymentId",
dp."planId", dp."freeTrialEndAt",
p.name AS "planName"
FROM treatments t
INNER JOIN "detailsPayment" dp ON dp.id = t."paymentId"
INNER JOIN plans p ON p.id = dp."planId"
WHERE "facilityId" = :P1 AND t.complete = TRUE AND TO_CHAR(t."createdAt", 'MM') = :P2 AND TO_CHAR(t."createdAt", 'YYYY') = :P3 AND dp."freeTrialEndAt" IS NULL
GROUP BY t."paymentId", dp."planId", dp."freeTrialEndAt", p.name
ORDER BY dp."planId" ASC

options.comment: get total treatments grouped by plans

sql.query:
SELECT
count(t.id) as "totalTreatments",
dp."planId",
p.name as "planName"
FROM treatments t
INNER JOIN "detailsPayment" dp ON dp.id = t."paymentId"
INNER JOIN plans p ON p.id = dp."planId"
WHERE t."facilityId" = :P1 AND complete = TRUE AND TO_CHAR(t."createdAt", 'MM') = :P2 AND TO_CHAR(t."createdAt", 'YYYY') = :P3 AND t."paymentId" IS NOT NULL AND dp."freeTrialEndAt" IS NULL
GROUP BY dp."planId", p.name
